info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 24 at 2:44PM MDT until May 24 at 3:15PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Roosevelt County in east central New Mexico... * Until 315 PM MDT. * At 243 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Portales, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Portales. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. High winds and large hail can spread quickly across open rangeland, especially along U.S. Highway 70 near Portales.
